SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_B_NAME,A.CATEGORY_A_NAME,C.CATEGORY_C_NAME,P.POST_HITS, F.POST_ID AS FILE_POST_ID, F.POST_FILE_PATH, P.POST_DATE, (P.POST_LIKE_COUNT + P.POST_COMMENT_COUNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C C ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID= C.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_B B ON C.CATEGORY_B_ID= B.ID AND B.CATEGORY_B_NAME= '무료' INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_A A ON B.CATEGORY_A_ID= A.ID AND A.CATEGORY_A_NAME= '후기' LEFT JOIN TBL_POST_FILE F ON P.ID = F.POST_ID ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC
)
